Reviews.Title: “Awesome staff, needs updated”
Reviews.Author: prettyinpink61
Reviews.Content: The staff was very nice, however the rooms were a big disappointment. They need updated, ceilings were "cobbwebbie", mattress lumpy, pillowcases wrinkled, smelled of cigarette smoke, even though "no smoking" rooms. Breakfast was nice and food good. Pick another place.

Reviews.Title: “update needed”
Reviews.Author: michelle v
Reviews.Content: Customer service was great. The hotel needs help. Year after year we stay because we like Country Inn & Suites but every year it gets worse. It is advertised on the outside of the building that they have an indoor pool but they don’t tell you it feels like ice. The Hot tub isn’t hot either, cooler than normal bath water. The pool and hot tub need to be resurfaced as you can see and feel bare ruff cement all over the bottom. The bathroom had mold all around the shower and the faucet and shower head were very corroded. It took ten minutes for the water coming out of the faucet to finally start to drip out of the shower head. The temperature control in the rooms is also very outdated. The employees are very nice and helpful but the hotel it's self is lacking!

Reviews.Title: “An average stay”
Reviews.Author: webothluv2travel
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this problem Thanksgiving weekend. The service of the management and staff were impeccable. We were greeted when we walked thru the door and our check in was expedited quickly and efficiently. The layout of the king suite was nice and accomodated my family very well. I was less enthused with the fact that a lone long strand of hair that apparently did not belong to me was visible to me on a bath towel. How that was missed when placing them in the rack is beyond me. The pressure on the shower head wasnt great and it took a few minutes for the hot water to kick in. However, when it did it did its job. Breakfast was great. The area was clean and all utensils were in their place...no problems there. Ionly wish that the cleanliness of the room matched up with the wonderful service that was displayed by the management and staff.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away from Home”
Reviews.Author: Richard A
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Country Inns & Suites, at 4225 Southport Crossing Way in Indianapolis, Indiana was THE BEST motel experience we’ve ever had. No, we are not hermits, but we know great service when we see it, use it and taste it. First and foremost, the entire staff was efficient, engaging and eager to serve at every turn. They made us actually feel at home during our entire 13-day stay. Our accommodations were clean, fresh and welcoming, while the array of breakfast and treat items were appealing and yummy! We are hooked on the Country Inn & Suites experience and will continue to recommend it to other travelers, especially, the Inn at Southport Crossings.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Accommodations!!”
Reviews.Author: donnalh333
Reviews.Content: The room was clean, spacious and bright. Beds were super comfortable and clean. Love the country pine decor and the noted artist prints. Indoor pool and hot tub worked fine. Breakfast was abundant with the usual pastries. They also offered eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, biscuits and gravy (3 each day), which my husband said was very good. I stayed 4 days/3 nights. One afternoon as I was walking into the hotel after being out with my 2 daughters, the hotel clerk stopped me to inform me that he just baked cookies and would we like any!! That was a first. I really enjoyed my stay and would return. Paid $42 per night with a summer special on hotels.com

Reviews.Title: “Rethink before booking at this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: docswife88
Reviews.Content: The BAD. . . Door keys stopped working repeatedly and had to go the desk multiple times for them to be reset. Hot Tub would not work. Dirty towels left in the room and trash cans not emptied. Side entrances into the hotel would not close and remained open all day and night. Vending machines not stocked. Ice machine only worked half the time. Knobs missing on dressers in the rooms. Low or no water pressure in many rooms. Very under-staffed so nothing got fixed when there was a problem. The GOOD. . .Front desk staff was very nice and as helpful as they could be when there was a problem. Breakfast was wonderful with multiple selections available. Front porch very pleasant with rocking chairs. Beds very comfortable. I probably would not stay at this hotel again, it is in desperate need of remodeling and updates.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed to say the least - Used to love Country Inn & Suites”
Reviews.Author: TravelingGirl46528
Reviews.Content: From the freezing cold pool to the moldy bathroom, not planning to return until updates and renovations are made and guests are listened to. I have brought issues to management's attention twice in the last year; however, no changes were made. A reduction in room charges does not change the experience for my family. Not expecting a high-end luxury hotel, but this location no longer measures up to past experiences with County Inn & Suites...

Reviews.Title: “Dusty and needs to be updated”
Reviews.Author: peacepax
Reviews.Content: I should have read reviews before booking this since I have to agree with what some others have said about rooms needing to be renovated and cleaned. The air filter needs to be changed, lots of dust. The carpet looked worn and seemed unclean. I am not a fan of the "Grandma decor" either like one other reviewer commented but in the past, I have liked staying at Country Inn since I felt they were a great value and had nicer rooms for hotels of this class. There were some good things about hotel, the breakfast had a lot of variety and was stocked and the front desk staff was efficient. This hotel is also conveniently by freeway and restaurants. However, I would stay elsewhere until they renovate hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Pick Another Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: antiquers50
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel to be dirty - carpet needed cleaning, less-than-fresh smelling, and just generally unkept. I absolutely would not spend another evening here. This hotel needs updating and more care to at least keeping the rooms (and halls) clean. First clue should have been the lack of lighting in the parking lot, and filthy entry way. Another big clue - I estimate only 10 rooms were being used - judging by the lack of lights. At first, we weren't even sure the place was open. I'd choose the new Quality Inn nearby. Good luck!

Reviews.Title: “In need of updating and renovation”
Reviews.Author: carla054
Reviews.Content: I've usually had good experiences with Country Inn & Suites. Sure I've never been a real fan of the grandma decor, but still i have found it usually in relatively good shape. Usually (a good hotel) will update their carpeting and upholstery every five years and maybe even the bathroom fixtures if they have the extra funds. Well, this place ain't one of them. But let me first start out with the positives: There were no bed bugs. They supplied soap The breakfast was supposedly good according to my parents they have wifi they also have a computer to use in the front if you need it okay, now to the bad side: as i said it's in need of updating, not just the rooms but the staff. the place wasn't cleaned well AT ALL. I actually cleaned the tv myself and wiped down the screen which was covered in some kind of gooey slime, possibly from kids touching it or something. the towels didn't look clean, they looked like they had just been folded without going to the laundry. The sink counter looked cracked and the lighting in the bathroom was an incredibly bright florescent that made me feel like i was about to be put on an operating table at the hospital. The sheets on the bed felt like they weren't completely dried. The carpet was dirty and old. the heating and cooling system is in need of some filter cleaning which actually is really important because if you don't clean a filter you can grow black mold. you can tell the filter wasn't clean because you could smell the dust burning when switched to heat. The lady at the front desk wasn't' really friendly. For $89 dollars a night that is absolutely absurd.

Reviews.Title: “This was a terrible experience, from unclean linen and rooms, to a bad breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: Rexsmom
Reviews.Content: This was a terrible experience in general. From the room being unclean, the air not working right, the linen was stained and appeared to be unwashed, the breakfast area was out of most items with an hour left of serving time. When I complained to the worker on duty (not a manager-she said there wasn't one on duty at the time) I was told "okay well I'll let the manager know your comments". There was NO I'm sorry, or a follow up from the manager before we left the next day. I could not believe what a terrible time we had at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Overall Very Nice Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: tracyl88
Reviews.Content: Nice clean hotel, nice location. Showing some signs of age but very well kept up. The beds were VERY comfortable - nice and plush comfortors! Excellent breakfast - wide assortment. The only problem was that the heating/cooling system in the pool area was broken and it was a hot and HUMID 92 degrees! Couldn't let my daughter swim too long because it was too overwhelming. They were very nice about it and called someone but it couldn't be fixed until the next day and we were gone by then. Very nice and friendly front desk service. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Poor Return Engagement”
Reviews.Author: Kdub11
Reviews.Content: Down for the second year to attend the MotoGP events and activities, stayed here in '09 - a pleasant stay with no dramas, hence our re-booking for 2010.....so we checked in from a Thursday to the following Monday. What a difference.....hotel looked tired, worn and dirty. Granted, the exterior looks good but once you check in and get to your room...yikes! The bathroom towels - I use better tea-towels in my kitchen, small and 'transparent' (If you know what I mean) Room not cleaned on Sunday, beds not made and no vaccuming or wipedowns anywhere. The fresh grout job around the bath looked like they went at it with a shovel - clearly no care taken. Busted bathroom knobs in our room and our friends room - the cleaners must have noticed but obviously no one took action. Oh, and the dirty pool referenced in an earlier review, well that dirt pile is still there!...there was what looked like coffee grounds in a pile and never moved all 5 days we were there! - actually it became a bit of a joke amongst our group for our stay as to when they were going to notice it.....clearly the management do not study customer on-line reviews and take action. A bunch of other issues also, but I fear running out of allotted space here. I certainly don't expect the Four Seasons for what I paid, but like most folks, we only use hotels to wash-up and sleep.....not hard, just provide decent towels, make the bed and keep your place clean.......Sorry, won't be back, I believe I can get better around the corner.

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay there again”
Reviews.Author: Michelle987654321
Reviews.Content: The motel was dirty, small pool with film on top, lots of brown/black dirt-like substance around door leading to pool, carpet peeling away from wall in room, bedspread had stains, ants in foom, conditioner 1/2 used, fortunately no bed bugs, breakfast area seats 16, one waffle maker. Stayed there for the indoor pool, breakfast and queen sized beds but it was definitely not worth the $139.

Reviews.Title: “Adequate but a little worn”
Reviews.Author: baseball_dad
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a quick overnight on our way to Bloomington, Indiana and the hotel was fine. Easy to get to just off the highway. Not the newest hotel (furniture and bathroom fixtures showed some wear) but it was clean. We got there late, went to sleep and left first thing so we had a quick visit. Basic breakfast served in lobby.

Reviews.Title: “FYI - No Pets”
Reviews.Author: ChicagoOrange
Reviews.Content: Don't read into my review too much as we didn't stay here (It's not so much a '3' as it is an 'NA' and an FYI). We normally stay at Country Inns because most allow pets. We started to assume that all do, as we've stayed at number of them throughout the Midwest. However, despite putting it in our reservation, we didn't learn that this location did not accept pets until after we checked in. So if you are traveling with pets, go with the Quality Inn across the parking lot. If you're not, than this Country Inn should be a bit cleaner, as they don't have to worry about cleaning-up after pets.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't like it”
Reviews.Author: peela
Reviews.Content: We requested a nonsmoking room, but it still smelled strongly of cigarette smoke and had a cigarette burn on the bed blanket. The walls were thin--we could clearly hear the conversation going on in the next room. The breakfast was terrible--stale bagels, powdery eggs, etc. We booked here because there supposedly was refrigerators and microwaves in the rooms, but there was neither in our room. We also were unable to get a king size bed. Having said all of that, the location was convenient and the cleanliness was OK, and there was no problem with the service.

Reviews.Title: “Will Be Back”
Reviews.Author: AlwaysInn09
Reviews.Content: While the hotel is older, it has a nice atmosphere. Staff is extremely friendly and helpful. I was there for a conference at a nearby hospital and location is awesome. Close to highway, plenty of restaurants, and less than 10 minutes from downtown. My room was very clean and I received a gift bag when I checked in for signing up to be a goldpoints member.

Reviews.Title: “Economical and Nice”
Reviews.Author: jillybagodonuts
Reviews.Content: I don't usually review hotels but I thought this place was great. For what we paid, a nice breakfast was included and I was surprised at the amenities. Our rooms was very nice, the staff was nice, and the cookies are really good! I would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Great hospitality at value price in prime location”
Reviews.Author: v6v7b
Reviews.Content: It was enchanting experience at a great price.Beatiful location and free continental breakfast.They also provide discount to neighboring restaurents........And there are pleny around the hotel. Very good check out experience too. Nice and clean hotel.

Reviews.Title: “If you like MOLD - stay here!”
Reviews.Author: WItravelgirl
Reviews.Content: Stayed at 3 Country Inn and Suites on a trip to Florida from Wisconsin. Was very disappointed with them all -- but this one definately was the worst! This property needs a lot of help. Both of our guest rooms were unclean, had to ask for new sheets when we found hair in our bed, bathrooms have mold around bathtub and ceiling, heating/air units are very dirty and the list could go on! The pool area needs to be shut down immediately and totally redone. The ceiling lights are filled with MOLD as there is absolutely no ventilation in the room! I only let the kids swim for a limited time as I felt it was so unclean. Breakfast area is very small, cramped, and needs to be reorganized. No waste basket even near the buffet area - have to walk clear across the room to through out any trash. Front desk clerk in am was extremely nice and I felt bad for her as I could tell she knows the property needs help. I am a travel planner and have always found Country Inn and Suites to be reliable properties to stay in. After this trip -- it will be a while before I stay in one again without really checking it out first!

Reviews.Title: “Nothing amazing, but definitely acceptable”
Reviews.Author: wouldbeworldtraveler
Reviews.Content: When I was at this hotel, they were in the early stages of a renovation, so I expect a future stay would be better. This hotel was slightly outdated decor and showing some age, but was generally clean and comfortable. There was nothing that necessarily would cause one to go out of their way to select this hotel, but also nothing that would really cause you to avoid the hotel either. Staff service was similar to the hotel - nothing terrible but nothing memorable either. Internet service and breakfast were acceptable to the standards for a limited service hotel. Location was near restaurants and near freeway, though not near downtown - it is definitely a suburban location. This all said, I can say I would stay again if I were in the Indianapolis area

Reviews.Title: “Would not stay again”
Reviews.Author: ejbOregon
Reviews.Content: We chose this motel because of the location. This was our first experience staying at a Country Inn and Suites so did not know what to expect. The staff were all very friendly and the motel is located near restaurants. The room was run down and could have been cleaner. The sheets were too small on both beds. The bath tub faucet dripped and the shower rod needs to be replaced with a curved rod. This was not a good value and we would not recommend staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Not as nice as advertised”
Reviews.Author: brya31
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this hotel. Based on the reviews, I expected a much cleaner place. The lobby was very nice, but before we entered our room I noticed the ceiling tiles above the door were all stained and some were broke. I also noticed that the wallpaper trim was ripped off the wall and it was patched with paper that was not even close to the same design. The bed was very firm and they only provided one pillow per person and the pillows were not comfortable at all. The pool was very cold and the tiles around the pool were very dirty. I looked up and noticed that of the ten lights above the pool and whirlpool, only four of them were working. I sat in the whirlpool and turned on the jets. Yikes! The bubbles were covered in a brownish film. I dont know if it was oil or dirt, but it was nasty. The metal chairs around the pool area were rusty. The room was very plain, but for the most part, it was clean. The sheets and comforter looked like they had taken their share of abuse over the years. The shower was clean and it had a new shower curtain. The carpet in the room was very clean also. Overall, I paid $81 for this room, so I feel I got what I paid for, so I wasnt upset, but I would never pay over that amount for this hotel.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: somewhere in the thumb of Michigan
Reviews.Title: “Quiet Hotel when traveling with kids!”
Reviews.Author: dabearsrock
Reviews.Content: We stayed at here for 3 nights between Christmas and New Year's for a wedding. Had a nice quiet stay, rooms were big for a family with kids. Pool was nice, Hot tub extremely HOT not for kids. Never took advantage of the breakfast, ( have at other country inns and they were good.) Service and staff were very friendly. My 3 year old really loved the fresh baked cookies everyday of our stay! Very close to anything you would want to visit in INDY. The shower could have been a bit cleaner above on the wall, and this was the only hotel I have ever stayed in without a carport to pull under. It was pouring rain on the day we left and we were soaked trying to pack everything up at 6:00am and no carport to pull under! But all in all a good place to lay your head. Not too much noise just right for a good nights sleep!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: smithquiz
Reviews.Content: We stayed here Dec 2005 and were very impressed. The lobby is well maintained, and the staff was extremely friendly and helpful. It was right off hwy 465, one mile south on hwy 65 south. The rooms were very large and spacious, and the bathroom was spacious and nice (granite counters). Towels were good too. Breakfast was very adequate, and typical. I was disappointed after reading the other reviews. There was no waffle maker, no eggs, no meat, no.... There was cold french toast you could stick in the toaster, bagels, muffins, oatmeal, yogurt, fruit.... but no hot food like others had stated in their review. Warning, I have asthma, and did fairly well, but the rooms are scented.

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: longroadhome
Reviews.Content: great rooms, breakfast was bigger that expected (hot foods, eggs, meats) close to good resturants and to downtown. Clean pool and hot tub and quite rooms. Good signal for my high speed wireless internet. Will stay there again.

HotelInfo.Name: Country Inn & Suites By Carlson Indianapolis-South
HotelInfo.Address: 4325 Southport Crossings Way, Indianapolis, IN 46237
